verses.verse: If thou wilt <S%H7725>return<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H7725>return<s%> unto me: and if thou wilt put <S%H5493>away<s%> thine <S%H8251>abominations<s%> out of my <S%H6440>sight<s%>, then shalt thou not <S%H5110>remove<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H7650>swear<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, in <S%H571>truth<s%>, in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>; and the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> themselves in him, and in him shall they <S%H1984>glory<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, Break <S%H5214>up<s%> your fallow <S%H5215>ground<s%>, and <S%H2232>sow<s%> not among <S%H6975>thorns<s%>.

<S%H4135>Circumcise<s%> yourselves to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H6190>foreskins<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, ye <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: lest my <S%H2534>fury<s%> come <S%H3318>forth<s%> like <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H1197>burn<s%> that none can <S%H3518>quench<s%> it, <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings<s%>.

<S%H5046>Declare<s%> ye in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H8085>publish<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; and <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H8628>Blow<s%> ye the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>: <S%H7121>cry<s%>, gather <S%H4390>together<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H622>Assemble<s%> yourselves, and let us <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H4013>defenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

Set <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H5251>standard<s%> toward <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: <S%H5756>retire<s%>, <S%H5975>stay<s%> not: for I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>destruction<s%>. retire: or, strengthen destruction: Heb. breaking

The <S%H738>lion<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> from his <S%H5441>thicket<s%>, and the <S%H7843>destroyer<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> is on his <S%H5265>way<s%>; he is gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> from his <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H7760>make<s%> thy <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8047>desolate<s%>; and thy <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall be laid <S%H5327>waste<s%>, without an <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>.

For this <S%H2296>gird<s%> you with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>, <S%H5594>lament<s%> and <S%H3213>howl<s%>: for the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is not turned <S%H7725>back<s%> from us.

And it shall come to pass at that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>, and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%>, and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> shall <S%H8539>wonder<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H162>Ah<s%>, <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>! <S%H403>surely<s%> thou hast <S%H5377>greatly<s%> <S%H5377>deceived<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Ye shall have <S%H7965>peace<s%>; whereas the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5060>reacheth<s%> unto the <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> shall it be <S%H559>said<s%> to this <S%H5971>people<s%> and to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, A <S%H6703>dry<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> of the high <S%H8205>places<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, not to <S%H2219>fan<s%>, nor to <S%H1305>cleanse<s%>,

Even a <S%H4392>full<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> from those places shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto me: now also will I <S%H1696>give<s%> <S%H4941>sentence<s%> against them. a full: or, a fuller wind than those give: Heb. utter judgments

Behold, he shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> as <S%H6051>clouds<s%>, and his <S%H4818>chariots<s%> shall be as a <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%>: his <S%H5483>horses<s%> are <S%H7043>swifter<s%> than <S%H5404>eagles<s%>. <S%H188>Woe<s%> unto us! for we are <S%H7703>spoiled<s%>.

O <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H3526>wash<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> from <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>, that thou mayest be <S%H3467>saved<s%>. How long shall thy <S%H205>vain<s%> <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> <S%H3885>lodge<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> thee?
For a <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H5046>declareth<s%> from <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, and <S%H8085>publisheth<s%> <S%H205>affliction<s%> from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>.

Make ye <S%H2142>mention<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; behold, <S%H8085>publish<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that <S%H5341>watchers<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>, and give <S%H5414>out<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%> against the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
As <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of a <S%H7704>field<s%>, are they against her round <S%H5439>about<s%>; because she hath been <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> against me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Thy <S%H1870>way<s%> and thy <S%H4611>doings<s%> have <S%H6213>procured<s%> these things unto thee; this is thy <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>, because it is <S%H4751>bitter<s%>, because it <S%H5060>reacheth<s%> unto thine <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

My <S%H4578>bowels<s%>, my <S%H4578>bowels<s%>! I am <S%H2342>pained<s%> <S%H3176><s%> at my <S%H7023>very<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>; my <S%H3820>heart<s%> maketh a <S%H1993>noise<s%> in me; I cannot hold my <S%H2790>peace<s%>, because thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, the <S%H8643>alarm<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>. my very: Heb. the walls of my heart

<S%H7667>Destruction<s%> upon <S%H7667>destruction<s%> is <S%H7121>cried<s%>; for the whole <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H7703>spoiled<s%>: <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> are my <S%H168>tents<s%> <S%H7703>spoiled<s%>, and my <S%H3407>curtains<s%> in a <S%H7281>moment<s%>.
How long shall I <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H5251>standard<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>?

For my <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H191>foolish<s%>, they have not <S%H3045>known<s%> me; they are <S%H5530>sottish<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%>, and they have none <S%H995>understanding<s%>: they are <S%H2450>wise<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil<s%>, but to do <S%H3190>good<s%> they have no <S%H3045>knowledge<s%>.
I <S%H7200>beheld<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and, lo, it was without <S%H8414>form<s%>, and <S%H922>void<s%>; and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and they had no <S%H216>light<s%>.
I <S%H7200>beheld<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and, lo, they <S%H7493>trembled<s%>, and all the <S%H1389>hills<s%> moved <S%H7043>lightly<s%>.
I <S%H7200>beheld<s%>, and, lo, there was no <S%H120>man<s%>, and all the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> were <S%H5074>fled<s%>.

I <S%H7200>beheld<s%>, and, lo, the fruitful <S%H3759>place<s%> was a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof were broken <S%H5422>down<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and by his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>.
For thus hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The whole <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H8077>desolate<s%>; yet will I not <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3617>end<s%>.

For this shall the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H56>mourn<s%>, and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> be <S%H6937>black<s%>: because I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, I have <S%H2161>purposed<s%> it, and will not <S%H5162>repent<s%>, neither will I turn <S%H7725>back<s%> from it.

The whole <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H1272>flee<s%> for the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> and <S%H7198>bowmen<s%> <S%H7411><s%>; they shall <S%H935>go<s%> into <S%H5645>thickets<s%>, and climb <S%H5927>up<s%> upon the <S%H3710>rocks<s%>: every <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H5800>forsaken<s%>, and not a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H2004>therein<s%>.

And when thou art <S%H7703>spoiled<s%>, what wilt thou <S%H6213>do<s%>? Though thou <S%H3847>clothest<s%> thyself with <S%H8144>crimson<s%>, though thou <S%H5710>deckest<s%> thee with <S%H5716>ornaments<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, though thou <S%H7167>rentest<s%> thy <S%H5869>face<s%> with <S%H6320>painting<s%>, in <S%H7723>vain<s%> shalt thou make thyself <S%H3302>fair<s%>; thy <S%H5689>lovers<s%> will <S%H3988>despise<s%> thee, they will <S%H1245>seek<s%> thy <S%H5315>life<s%>. face: Heb. eyes

For I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> as of a woman in <S%H2470>travail<s%>, and the <S%H6869>anguish<s%> as of her that bringeth forth her first <S%H1069>child<s%>, the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, that <S%H3306>bewaileth<s%> herself, that <S%H6566>spreadeth<s%> her <S%H3709>hands<s%>, saying, <S%H188>Woe<s%> is me now! for my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H5888>wearied<s%> because of <S%H2026>murderers<s%>.
